abstract: Some New York City school teachers and principals, amid budget cuts and testing pressures, are stretching money, space and time to promote movement during the school day.
snippet: Amid budget cuts and testing pressures, some New York teachers and principals have stretched money, space and time to prioritize movement during the school day.
lead_paragraph: Amid budget cuts and testing pressures, some New York teachers and principals have stretched money, space and time to prioritize movement during the school day.

headline.main: Fitting In Exercise, Between Math and English
headline.print_headline: Fitting In Time for Exercise, Between Math and English
headline.seo: At New York Schools, Finding Time for Exercise
